page.title: 19BEACH AMENITIES SURVEY(cont)
page.content: THE TOURIST SEASON? A lot of vandalism and graffiti caused in holiday time,particularly after closing time.Too noisy,with late night licences in pubs and clubs.There are too many amusemant arcades,which lower the tone of the area.Heavy traffic causes parking problems while litter fills the streets and gardens.Residents cannot use their own beach,pubs or metros as they are too crowded with visitors and tourists.Drunkenness and violence frightens residents especially at peak holiday times.
